CHAT.comment: NEW YORK STATE BOARD OF ELECTIONS, ET AL., Petitioners v. MARGARITA LOPEZ TORRES, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10: 02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON. ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS NEW YORK STATE BOARD OF ELECTIONS, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ANDREW J. ROSSMAN ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS NEW YORK COUNTY DEMOCRATIC COMMITTEE ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF FREDERICK A.O. SCHWARZ, JR. ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON. ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS NEW YORK STATE BOARD OF ELECTIONS, ET AL.
(Whereupon, at 11:03 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
